mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (id, passwd, name, gender, birth, phone, address, tel, email, reg_date) VALUES (#{id}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{regDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET name= #{name}, gender=#{gender}, passwd=#{passwd}, birth=#{birth}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, tel=#{tel}, email= #{email} WHERE id = #{id}
